name: Panic In The Femur Breaker
description:
Late April Fools game! Panic In The Femur Breaker is a short visual novel based on both SCP 106 and the 'FY' OFF fangame series. You get to put Ruka in the femur breaker! WOW! Includes THREE alternate endings. 

Developed by @/ballparkreject and @/ethaclone  on Twitter.

I don't know how to make a pretty itch.io page forgive me -Etha
